TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CycleFocusHandler(object o, CycleFocusArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed CycleFocusHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the CycleFocusHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the CycleFocusHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the CycleFocusHandler is removed from the event.
